deIdi2b2.TEXT:
Record date: 2162-01-22
INTERNAL MEDICINE ASSOCIATES
NORTHLAND MEDICAL CLINIC
Reason for visit f/u
Major Problems
Hypertension
on atenolol50 QD. Did not tolerate ARB. Doing well
Diabetes mellitus
Followed at Christy Clinic for DM. On NPH 34 AM, 12 PM and regular 10 QM and 14PM. Last HBAIC 8.9 from 7.2. Not on ACE due to cough. Did not tolerate ARB. Ophtho exam UTD. Continue current regimen for now and followup with Christy for insulin adjustments
Osteoarthritis
Bilateral shoulder pain. Seen by ortho. Much better after cortisone injection on right. WIll f/u with them. Shoulder pain much improved after working with physical therapy.
Hypercholesterolemia
On pravachol 20mg and tolerating well. Last chol 131 trig 119, HDL 31, LDL 92. Would like to start niacin but pt not interested at this time. Has tried lipitor and zocor but developed myositis and muscle pain.
Continue pravachol for now.
Coronary artery disease
s/p CABG x 3. On atenolol/ASA. In Fahey Center last week for CP (no change from previous) while exercising at cardiac rehab. Has had several stress tests after surgery that have been negative. Pt never started Imdur as directed. Will try this.
May be related to esophageal spasm or musculoskeletal?
A/P: CP: unclear etiology. Will try Imdur 30 QD. Will also help with HTN.
Congestive heart failure
Doing well. Wt stable No SOB. Intermittent CP-chronic since surgery. On lasix 20mg QD. Continue for now.
Claudication
Reports very tired legs and calf pain with exertion since starting rehab. Occ cold toes. No change in color. Occ numbness bilaterally.
See PE
A/P: ?claudication. Will check art lenis and exercise ABIs first. on ASA.
Allergies
Aspirin allergy GI bleeding
Drug allergy vioxx-rash
Zestril-cough
Penicillin allergy
Active Medications
nph insulin 35 units sc qam 12 units qpm
regular insulin 10 u qam, 10 u qpm
Neurontin 100 mg PO 2 TAB TID
Spectazole 1% TOPICAL QD apply cream qd
Ntg 0.3 mg SL Q 5 MIN x3 prn chest pain
atenolol 50mg po qd
aspirin 81 mg po qd
potassium chloride 10 meq po qd
hydrocortisone and bismuth subgallate (anusol hc) suppositories apply 1 prn bid
Pravachol 20mg po qd
Ultram 50 mg po Q 6 H prn
Lasix 20 mg PO QD
Nexium 40 mg PO QD
Imdur 30 mg po qd
Insulin syringes BD U-100 1cc #100 w/11 refills
One touch strips 5x a day #200 w/ 1 year refills
Past medical history as above
left rotator cuff tear
s/p turp 1yr ago
Review of systems as above, otherwise neg
Physical examination
Pulse 65
Blood pressure 120/70

General appearance Well developed, well nourished, no acute distress.
Chest CTA B w/o c/w/r.
Cor RRR nl s1, s2 without m/r/g.
Extrem No clubbing, cyanosis. 1+edema B. 1+pulses lower ex B.
Neuro A&O x3, CN 2-12 grossly intact.
Assessment and plan as above
Disposition
f/u in few months
